Damage_Resistance.help: Malaise is resistant to some forms of damage.
Damage_Resistance.targetHelp: Malaise is resistant to some forms of damage.

Spectral_Wounds.help: The target is made to believe that they are suffering from real, bleeding wounds, but the effects are initially only in their mind. Only at the end are the wounds made real in a burst of lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Spectral_Wounds.targetHelp: You are suffering from a bleeding wound caused by Malaise's mind!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Flash.help: You unleash a thunderous blast of light that stuns your targets momentarily, holding them in place. After the flash ends, the targets also suffer a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Flash.targetHelp: You have been held and your chance to hit is reduced.

Telekinetic_Blast.help: You fire a burst of energy from your mind with such force that it can knock enemies back. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Induced_Horror.help: You create horrifying visions within the minds of your target and those around them. These foes are held in fear as bleeding wounds manifest on their bodies. When the visions end, the targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and recharge rate. Recharge: Slow
Induced_Horror.targetHelp: You are held and are suffering psionic damage and endurance loss over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and recharge rate have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} creates unrelenting terror in your mind, causing you to tear at yourself in a frenzy and causing {Damage} points of psionic damage.
The wounds you suffer due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} cause {Damage} points of lethal damage and drain your endurance.

Lost_in_Dreams.help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun. Recharge: Slow
Lost_in_Dreams.shortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)
Lost_in_Dreams.targetHelp: You are suffering psionic damage over time and are either feared, confused or stunned.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} causes you to become {PowerName}, inducing weakness in your mind and causing {Damage} points of psionic damage!
You continue to suffer {Damage} points of psionic damage as you remain {PowerName}.

Mental_Blast.help: You fire a blast of mental energy at your target, clouding their mind and dealing psionic damage. The cloudiness results in decreased chance to hit and recharge rate. Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and recharge rate are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Total_Domination.help: You attempt to exert full control over the mind of a single target. The target suffers psionic damage, reduced recovery and may be put to sleep. Recharge: Slow
Total_Domination.targetHelp: You are suffering from reduced recovery. You may also be put to sleep.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
